I'm working on some materials for people to learn JPA in a JSE 
environment=
. I decided I wanted them to write a series of unit tests 
to test several =
different queries and ultimately use a test-oriented 
approach to infer the=
 API.

What I came up with (pass 1) is at the bottom of this page: 
http://=
schuchert.wikispaces.com/JPA+Tutorial+2+-+Working+with+Queries+1

Do you ha=
ve any opinions about how I've used JUnit here?
